segments.text: I want to go to china for sight-seeing . What do you think of it , Mum ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why not ? China is a wonderful country .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Will you go with me , too ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I'm afraid not now . I'm too busy .
segments.speaker: S2
